content: TOKYO Japan's Mitsubishi Heavy Industries Ltd  (MHI) expects arbitrators to rule by the end of March on a compensation claim related to the shutdown of California's San Onofre nuclear plant brought by a unit of Edison International .
name: Edison International
title: Japan's Mitsubishi Heavy expects ruling on San Onofre nuclear plant claim by end March: CEO

content: TOKYO  Feb 2 Japan's Mitsubishi Heavy Industries Ltd (MHI) expects arbitrators to rule by the end of March on a compensation claim related to the shutdown of California's San Onofre nuclear plant brought by a unit of Edison International.
name: Edison International
title: Japan's Mitsubishi Heavy expects ruling on San Onofre nuclear plant claim by end March-CEO

content: A U.S. appeals court on Friday revived a nearly decade-old lawsuit by Edison International employees in California who say the utility favored higher-cost mutual funds over lower-cost ones in its retirement plan.
name: Edison International
title: U.S. court revives long-running case over Edison International 401(k) plan

content: April 13 A U.S. appeals court on Wednesday dismissed a lawsuit by Edison International employees in California who accused the utility of favoring higher-cost mutual funds over lower-cost ones in its retirement plan  despite a U.S. Supreme Court ruling backing the workers.
name: Edison International
title: Edison International wins dismissal of U.S. lawsuit over 401(k) plan

content: * Says CEO Theodore Craver's FY 2015 total compensation $11.1 million versus $14.2 million in FY 2014 - SEC filing  Source text for Eikon:  Further company coverage:
name: Edison International
title: BRIEF-Edison international announces CEO FY 2015 total compensation

content: WASHINGTON The U.S. Supreme Court on Monday revived claims made by Edison Internationalemployees who accused the utility of favoring higher-cost mutual funds over lower-cost ones in its retirement plan.
name: Edison International
title: U.S. top court hands win to employees in Edison International 401(k) dispute

content: WASHINGTON  May 18 The U.S. Supreme Court on Monday revived claims made by Edison International  employees who accused the utility of favoring higher-cost mutual funds over lower-cost ones in its retirement plan.
name: Edison International
title: UPDATE 1-U.S. top court hands win to employees in Edison International 401(k) dispute

content: LONDON  April 13 Falkland Oil and Gas (FOGL)  said on Monday it had decided together with its joint venture partners Noble Energy and Edison International  to shelve plans to drill a second oil well in the south and east Falkland basin.
name: Edison International
title: Falkland Oil and Gas  partners shelve parts of Falklands oil drilling

content: WASHINGTON  Feb 24 The U.S. Supreme Court on Tuesday appeared set to revive certain claims in a class action lawsuit against Edison International by employees who accused the utility of favoring higher-cost mutual funds over-lower cost ones in its retirement plan.
name: Edison International
title: U.S. justices signal support for plaintiffs in Edison 401(k) case

content: WASHINGTON  Feb 24 The U.S. Supreme Court on Tuesday appeared ready to give Edison International  employees who accused the utility of favoring higher-cost mutual funds over lower-cost ones in its retirement plan a chance to revive some of their claims.
name: Edison International
title: UPDATE 1-U.S. justices signal support for plaintiffs in Edison 401(k) case
